title: In specific cases where CDS is not bounded by roads, nallas and railway lines, the boundary of the Cluster may be decided by the Municipal Commissioner
clause_text: In specific cases where CDS is not bounded by roads, nallas and railway lines, the boundary of the Cluster may be decided by the Municipal Commissioner. The CD may consist of a mix of structures of different characteristics such as Cessed buildings in Island City, which attract the provisions of MHAD Act, 1976.

source_pdf.text_snippet: In specific cases where CDS is not bounded by roads, nallas and railway lines, the boundary of the Cluster may be decided by the Municipal Commissioner.
